repos.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides structured spec-driven development workflow tools for AI-assisted software development, featuring a real-time web dashboard and VSCode extension for monitoring and managing your project's progress directly in your development environment.

plugins.name: spec-workflow-mcp
plugins.description: MCP server for structured spec-driven development with real-time web dashboard and VSCode extension.

plugins.name: spec-workflow-mcp-with-dashboard
plugins.description: MCP server with auto-started dashboard for structured spec-driven development.
